abort.reconfigure_successful:
**Re-configuration was successful**

Go to webhooks in the Traccar Client and update the webhook with the following URL: `{webhook_url}`

See [the documentation]({docs_url}) for further details.

create_entry.default:
To send events to Home Assistant, you will need to set up the webhook feature in Traccar Client.

Use the following URL: `{webhook_url}`

See [the documentation]({docs_url}) for further details.
